title: False Victories
description: Two Murders - Three Decades Apart Captain Denmark has assigned the case to the best of his officers, Sheban. Tagging along him is the ever-energetic newbie, Jala, who wishes to prove a point to her ideal, Sheban. However, the case holds special place for Sheban as it will be the last case of his career. By taking early retirement, he wishes to reconcile with his wife who is drifting apart with time. Will he be able to solve the case before his personal life comes completely undone?
author: Saadia Iqtidar
